title: Spacious 3-bed family house
shortDescription: Bright family house with garden and garage.
longDescription: A spacious three bedroom family house with large living area, modern kitchen, bathrooms and private garden.

title: Modern 1-bed flat
shortDescription: Compact modern flat near transport links.
longDescription: Nice one-bedroom flat featuring open-plan kitchen and large windows, open living area, attached bathroom and balcony.

title: Large 5-bed detached
shortDescription: Luxury detached house with a large garden and pool.
longDescription: High-end five bedroom property with multiple reception rooms, modern kitchen, large living area in ground floor, bathrooms, pool and car porch.

title: Cosy 2-bed townhouse
shortDescription: Townhouse with modern kitchen and patio.
longDescription: Two bedroom townhouse located close to local shops with private patio, bathrooms, living area, dining area and kitchen.

title: Studio apartment central
shortDescription: Affordable studio in a central location.
longDescription: A modern type flat with 3 bedrooms, bathrooms, modern kitchen, living area with large windows, dining area and balcony.

title: Refurbished 4-bed semi
longDescription: Two story house with large garden area, four bedrooms semi with new kitchen, bathrooms, living area, dining room

title: Luxury penthouse flat
longDescription: A luxury top-floor apartment built with the highest quality materials, featuring a private outdoor roof area and a front-desk assistant to help you with daily tasks and security, modern kitchen, dining area, living room, bathrooms.
